Entries.default:
"You and the sick ones will come with us." The guard approaches Pitli with a spear held out, keeping her distance.

Pitli's watery eyes are wide with horror.

"We've done nothing! E-Eothas protects..." Her words are lost in a furious coughing fit.

The guards step back, raising their arms to shield their faces.

"Come, before you kill us all!" The guards hold their spears out and prod Pitli along like a wounded beast. 

The sick Roparu shuffle out of her home and follow behind.
